author: James Tanner
method: Boil the potatoes in salted water for 12-15 minutes, or until tender. Drain and season with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Add the olive oil and butter and lightly crush with a fork or potato masher. Stir in the chopped truffle. To serve, place onto a serving plate with a sprig of basil, to garnish.
ingredients: 150g/5½oz new potatoes,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  ½ tbsp olive oil,  1 tbsp butter ,  ½ tsp chopped truffle (from a jar) ,  sprig fresh basil, to garnish
